alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Morris; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morris, south central Wabaunsee and northwestern Lyon Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Parkerville to 5 miles east of Burdick. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Council Grove, Americus, White City, Wilsey, Parkerville, Bushong, Dunlap and Council Grove Lake. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 117 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Kansas.
